about.name: Hi, I'm Rafael Gaitan
about.profession: Front-end developer with 4+ years of experience in web and mobile applications
about.summary: Bringing adaptability, active listening, and a commitment to high-quality, tailored code. Motivated by continuous improvement and team collaboration, delivering solutions that align with the company's goals and drive impactful results.
about.summaryTwo: I follow development principles like SOLID, DRY, and KISS, which allow me to create scalable, maintainable, and high-quality solutions.
about.summaryThree: I enjoy collaborating with teams and bringing innovative ideas to overcome challenges.
about.summaryFour: My focus is on details, always aiming to deliver the best solutions tailored to the specific needs of each project.
about.summaryFive: If you're looking for someone committed, detail-oriented, and ready to tackle new challenges, I'd love to work with you.

agrocollect.title: AgroCollect
agrocollect.description: Corporate mobile app built with an offline-first approach to support field workers in rural areas. Allows data collection and management without internet. I implemented a CMS for streamlined data management, documented features and flows, and organized technical documentation for the entire development process.

riskmann.title: RiskMann
riskmann.description: App for inspecting tools, equipment, and facilities using customizable templates. Users can schedule inspections, create action plans, and track and analyze results.

iper.title: IPER
iper.description: Real-time risk matrix tracking system by activity. Supports risk identification, assessment, and control, and allows the creation of context-specific action plans.

scow.title: SCOW
scow.description: Management system for security companies or entities that handle firearms. Manages clients, users, armories, and inventory of weapons and ammunition.
